description: Use this safe and effective 2-in-1 screen cleaner tool and microfiber cloths to remove dust, dirt and fingerprints from your iPad, iPod, iPhone, Kindle Fire and Android screens. Unique 2-in-1 screen cleaner tool includes both cleaning fluid and a detachable cleaning pad. Its antistatic formula will help to repel dust and is specially formulated not to leave any kind of residue on your screen. Includes a refill kit with 6.75fl. oz of cleaning fluid, an additional cleaning pad and funnel.
title: Philips SVC7168/27 iSolution Cleaning Kit with Refill for iPad, iPod, iPhone, Kindle Fire, or Android
